reviewText: The series goes by the Bible.  Great videos.

Just finished the set we rented at the library.

Great acting and story telling, and seems accurate.

We'll probably buy these sometime soon.

i wouldnt tell anyone to buy this i never read in the bible that jesus had woman almost stalking him this is more like a mind game story it wasn't worth sending back i don't think im going to give it away most likely ill throw it away
This was an excellent Bible Collection, plus the store was great. The time my product got to me and the packaging was great.

This set is slightly different from mine, but only in that this set is a set of five.  My set was a set of four VHS, but five tapes total.  Whichever title that wasn't in this set, I got soon afterwards.  I have thoroughly enjoyed all of the titles in this series.  As I can afford, I add new titles to my library.  A couple I have purchased in DVD, perhaps because the DVD was cheaper than the VHS at the time.  Old Testament, in general, is a weak part of my knowledge, so these productions help me to know the characters a little better.  I have watched each volume several times over time & whole-heartedlyrecommend them to anybody.  The sceanery & costumes really look authentic.  Whether they are biblically accurate, I can't say.  But for sheer entertainment, they are worth viewing &/or purchasing.

I LOVE THIS COLLECTION SO MUCH THAT I BOUGHT AS MANY OF THE OTHER ONES (ALSO MADE BY "BIBLE COLLECTION") AS I COULD.  AND THE PEOPLE ARE BEAUTIFUL, REMINDS ME OF HOW THEY WERE DESCRIBED AS SUCH IN THE BIBLE.  VERY SATISFIED WITH THESE MOVIES THAT I SHARE THEM WITH ONES IN MY FAMILY AND WATCH THEM OVER AND OVER.  I SERIOUSLY RECOMMEND THESE
I can only recommend this DVD Set. No other is as close as them to the scripture.
